pages.text: $(li)The Clay Ball is a maleable material that can be used to craft $(l)Clay Lump$(), $(l)Clay$() and $(l)Daub$().$(br)$(li)You can make $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/brick)Bricks$(/l) smelting this item in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/mason)Masons$(/l) will exchange Clay Balls by your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
